Title: The Birdcage
Writer: Jean Poiret, Francis Veber, Édouard Molinaro
Actors: Robin Williams, Nathan Lane, Gene Hackman
Plot: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing, conservative parents.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 7 wins & 25 nominations total
